definition: to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth
article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)
oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning

pinyin: Lan2 Zheng4 Chang2 cheng2 pin3 you2 guan3 dao4

sentences.english: Want to be the head of sales of petroleum products. Initiative, responsible, communicative.
sentences.chinese: 想成爲成品油銷售主管，主動，有責任心，健談。

sentences.english: Subsidies were granted to the fishery industry and four others that were greatly affected by changes in the prices of refined petroleum products.
sentences.chinese: 對受成品油調價影響較大的漁業等五大行業實施補貼。

sentences.english: The refined rice bran oil could meet the requirements of the national standard four-step.
sentences.chinese: 生產出的成品油，達到國標四級精煉米糠油要求。

sentences.english: We will fully implement VAT reform and the reform of taxes and fees for refined petroleum products.
sentences.chinese: 全面實施增值稅轉型改革和成品油稅費改革。

sentences.english: The refined oil market is an oligopoly market in our country.
sentences.chinese: 我國成品油市場是一個寡頭壟斷市場。

sentences.english: We worked out a plan for the reform of taxes and fees for refined petroleum products.
sentences.chinese: 研究提出了成品油稅費改革方案。

sentences.english: The operating license of product oil shall be subject to the administration of the operating license of type A.
sentences.chinese: 成品油的經營許可納入甲種經營許可證管理。

sentences.english: Multiproduct software sets optimal pump use, Oil & Gas Journal, 2006
sentences.chinese: 西南成品油管道輸送模擬軟件，油氣儲運，2006。

sentences.english: This ship is oil tanker owning single screw.
sentences.chinese: 本船是單螺旋槳成品油輪。

sentences.english: After years of deliberation, reform in pricing, taxes and fees for refined petroleum products was smoothly introduced.
sentences.chinese: 醞釀多年的成品油價格和稅費改革順利推出。

sentences.english: We will continue to tighten management of the market for finished oil and market fairs.
sentences.chinese: 繼續整治成品油市場和各類集貿市場。

definition: China Petroleum and Chemical Corporation, Sinopec/abbr. for 中國石油化工股份有限公司|中国石油化工股份有限公司
